sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import './Button.css' const Button = ({type, text, clickHandler }) => ( ) Button.propTypes = { type: PropTypes.string, text: PropTypes.string.isRequired, clickHandler: PropTypes.func.isRequired } export default Button
